name: Cat Collects
description:
Play as one of three cats or a rat and collect the 5 items present on 5 randomly generated levels, while attempting to minimize the amount of steps you take.

Music by Anonymous from: https://freepd.com/music/Coy%20Koi.mp3

Note: Sometimes the level generated may be impossible to complete.  Restarting is recommended. Hopefully after the jam this will be fixed.

Thanks so much for playing!

P.S. You're awesome!
